field.name: summary
field.value: Related types have to be registered in one ActiveRecordStarter.RegisterTypes() call

field.name: description
field.value: When trying to register entity and entity that inherits from it (class table inheritance), both types have to be specified in single ActiveRecordStarter.RegisterTypes(), otherwise AR will complain that the second entity does not define PrimaryKey.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: I tried for some days tro fix it, but any fix would rip apart the whole NH xml generation, which I consider to risky in an alpha release state. I added a test to show the current (incomplete) behaviour, so we can solve when refactoring this for AR3.
